channel.title: CVE Feed for Unisoc (Shanghai) Technologies Co., Ltd. -- T760/T770/T820/S8000
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unisoc (Shanghai) Technologies Co., Ltd. -- T760/T770/T820/S8000

item.title: CVE-2023-52344|2024-08-02T22:55:41.681Z -- unisoc%20%28shanghai%29%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- t760%2Ft770%2Ft820%2Fs8000
item.description: In modem-ps-nas-ngmm, there is a possible undefined behavior due to incorrect error handling. This could lead to remote information disclosure no additional execution privileges needed

item.title: CVE-2023-52342|2024-08-02T22:55:40.913Z -- unisoc%20%28shanghai%29%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- t760%2Ft770%2Ft820%2Fs8000
item.description: In modem-ps-nas-ngmm, there is a possible undefined behavior due to incorrect error handling. This could lead to remote information disclosure no additional execution privileges needed

item.title: CVE-2023-52341|2024-08-02T22:55:41.648Z -- unisoc%20%28shanghai%29%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- t760%2Ft770%2Ft820%2Fs8000
item.description: In Plaintext COUNTER CHECK message accepted before AS security activation, there is a possible missing permission check. This could lead to remote information disclosure no additional execution privileges needed

item.title: CVE-2023-42645|2024-08-02T19:23:40.095Z -- unisoc%20%28shanghai%29%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- t760%2Ft770%2Ft820%2Fs8000
item.description: In sim service, there is a possible way to write permission usage records of an app due to a missing permission check. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed

item.title: CVE-2023-40638|2024-08-02T18:38:51.009Z -- unisoc%20%28shanghai%29%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- t760%2Ft770%2Ft820%2Fs8000
item.description: In Telecom service, there is a possible missing permission check. This could lead to local denial of service with System execution privileges needed

item.title: CVE-2023-52343|2024-08-02T22:55:41.558Z -- unisoc%20%28shanghai%29%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- t760%2Ft770%2Ft820%2Fs8000
item.description: In SecurityCommand message after as security has been actived., there is a possible improper input validation. This could lead to remote information disclosure no additional execution privileges needed

item.title: CVE-2023-33914|2024-08-02T15:54:13.456Z -- unisoc%20%28shanghai%29%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- t760%2Ft770%2Ft820%2Fs8000
item.description: In NIA0 algorithm in Security Mode Command, there is a possible missing verification incorrect input. This could lead to remote information disclosure no additional execution privileges needed
